name: The Pound
description:
The Pound is a 3rd Person Action Adventure Game, based in the TTRPG world of the same name. It is being developed as a 2nd-year student project at The AIE in Adelaide, South Australia!

  • Play as Casey, a young Adnamatna man just starting his life a defender of The Pound and discover Act One of his story.
  • Fight off Ragers, Humans infected and changed by a biological disease.
  • Explore the beautiful outback environment and Listen to Yura Muda to develop your survival skills.

Design - Mitchell Dole & Michael Manson

Art -Dan Lee &  Benjamin Johncock

Programming - Leo Brinkworth, Riley Hart, Joel Lynch

We would greatly appreciate people testing our game and giving feedback available through the games pause menu or when completing the act. Share the page with your friends the more we test the better the game can get!

Alpha Release - You can complete the entire narrative of the game. There are no skills to spend levels on yet. Uncle Jarrah Character does not yet follow you or move. Many sounds are yet to come.

* Contains violence and a swear word*

Videos contain placeholder pictures being replaced during the project.

Running the game

Download the zipped file from google drive

Unzip to any location you like

Navigate to the folder

Doubleclick  The Pound.exe
